The fight does not end until I fulfill my dream
I wonder how far I have come now?
In ten years, I will be living the dream
It is the scenario I wrote for myself, so I will have no regrets
But life is not that easy, and it is full of obstacles
Still, I swear to myself that I will not ever back down
I have a dream that I absolutely want to achieve
So I fuel my passion until I succeed
There will be meetings and partings along the way
But I will simply believe in my strength that you have taught me
And rise back up again and again and again

subete no sen wa kimi ni tsuzuku kakehashi sa
The reason I chose to take a detour
was to fall ever deeper in love with you
I have a feeling I have always known
what your voice sounds like when it calls my name
many lines that make up a suspension bridge leading to you
Show me the way I am sure our path
your way connects us without any turns
Show me the way It leads to the place where we promised
Show me the way I will never give up
Show me the way and see that we are certain to meet again
Do we absolutely positively have to wait until our dream
Azuki Miho Nickname: Amame Dream for the future Voice Actress
The original book for the super-popular +NATURAL currently serialized in Weekly Shounen Jack!!
The real story written by the receiver of the amateur award of Novel Pleiades
Perfect Crime Club h is good.
I do not think it can beat CROW h and +NATURAL.
Th-Then, with a majority vote of 3 for Win and 4 for Lose,
Ashirogi Muto's Perfect Crime Club h will not be serialized...
If we do not pass Ashirogi here, they will not be able to draw for Jack anymore, right?
Yes, that is the reason for this vote.
It is ridiculous for us to let Ashirogi go based on a vote in the first place!
We should take better care of our authors!
We are in a position to influence the lives of our authors.
It would be a different story if the vote was 7 to 0,
but to abandon our authors over such a narrow margin may not be the right thing to do.
but we should leave this decision to the readers, after all.
I cast my vote for them to win.
No, I want them to win.
Leave the decision to the readers, huh?
That is what we have always done.
I will also change my vote to win.
Perfect Crime Club h will be serialized!
That is the news for now!
Yo, it looks like you have got yourself a serialization.
I will congratulate you, just for today.
Now we can compete with you again!
I am looking forward to your first chapter!
It is thanks to you that we were able to come this far!
Ever since we saw your name listed as a Tezuka prize finalist at a convenience store back in middle school,
we made you our rival and pledged to overtake you.
We decided to stop Tanto h and aim higher because you were there as our rival.
Ashirogi and I are fated rivals.
It should be written as formidable enemy but pronounced as friend.
We are going to put everything we have learned into this one, so we will win for sure!
So you have confidence in it, then?
Then I shall return to work.
I am getting all tense now.
Let us put the complicated stuff on hold for now and get to celebrating!
Mashiro gets the piece with the chocolate.
They are both really happy with being serialized in Jack!
Oh, Miho prepared this kind of surprise?
Akito, bring your computer over here.
Well, is it alright for the two of us to see it?
It is a bit embarrassing, but it is fine.
Mashiro, your birthday present made me really happy.
Because I received a drawing from Mashiro, the manga artist,
I will give you a vocal present, as a voice actress.
I thought it was a video letter.
Has she gotten better at singing?
Oh yeah, she did say she was going to learn how to sing.
Oh, there is been an editor change?
The Chief Editor noticed, after all...
Chief, can I have a moment?
Have you do something you need to apologize for?
YOU-Um... for Perfect Crime Club h!
I submitted it as if it was all my work, but I had Hattori help me...
I deserve to be removed from it!
It is not a bad thing to receive the advice of others.
Of course, that is only if you are willing to cast aside your pride and listen carefully to the person offering advice.
This serialization is a result of you taking action to help Ashirogi.
Well, I could tell that Hattori played a large part in it.
And he also understands Ashirogi well.
That is why I decided to leave them to him.
Now, I suppose it is time for you to return the favor.
It looks like he is having some troubles.
We are getting a new editor?
Now that we just got serialized...
It is not a bad thing.
In fact, you should be happy.
But Miura, you have done so much for us,
and we finally got this far together...
I told you, it is okay to be happy.
It is frustrating to get a different assignment now,
but it worked out so that Hattori and I have swapped places.
I will be in charge of +NATURAL.
Make Perfect Crime Club h a big hit with Hattori!
And then we will duke it out!
Shujin, I am going to our studio!
How nice... it feels like a man's world!
Is it really okay for me to be Ashirogi's editor?
This is what you wanted, right?
That is why I did all that... but now it seems selfish, and I feel bad about it...
But really, Ashirogi overcame some huge obstacles.
I hope Fukuda understands this and does not get any crazy ideas...
Should not you take a break, at least for today?
Let Us head over to Ashirogi's now!
They have been waiting for you all this time!
Everyone from kids to housewives are snatching up Otter figures!
I did hear some rumors about that!
And now, it is time for This week's Aoki Kou!
Then I will sign one of each kind and give them all to her personally!
No... she told me to give it to her editor.
It looks like the Otters h anime is doing well.
I asked my editor about this, but...
Do you know about that secret Otter figure?
You can exchange the hands with real limestone!
Hattori, I am glad to be working with you again!
I am looking forward to it!
We are about to look over it again, starting with chapter one.
I think the first chapter can get first place.
It got serialized because they judged it could win over Niizuma's manga, after all.
It seems like they took a vote on whether this manga could win over CROW h and +NATURAL.
The result was 4 vs. 3 for Lose.
But there is plenty of potential for you to win from here on out.
That is why it got serialized.
It will not be enough to just look it over again.
We need to rewrite it so anyone can agree that we will win!
You do not have enough time to rewrite it!
Putting this zeal into their manga...
So we need battles after all?
but +NATURAL h has storylines that do not.
Hattori, where do you think we are losing to Eiji?
If I had to say, it would be his expressiveness.
The way he uses perspective and sound effects.
The feelings and representations of the characters are straightforward and full-bodied,
and his dialogue is polished and easy to understand.
On the other hand, you beat him in your sketching.
Mashiro's realistic art is better than his.
There is also the sheer amount of Takagi's ideas.
Miura, do you have the novel version of +NATURAL h on you?
Since I am their editor now, I carry a copy with me.
Can you show it to us?
it will be made available soon after the new year.
But the content is pretty much the same as the manuscripts Niizuma received.
He cuts out the unneeded parts in the manuscript...
and inserts new scenes as necessary.
you will see that Niizuma's expressiveness made +NATURAL h much better.
He is done so much with it, I would say this is more about his imagination than his expression.
Also, the way he uses the space in his panel layouts...
Panels where he zooms out and shows the whole picture.
Readers can freely give it their own interpretation.
Is this because I do not put blank panels in my storyboards?
No, I put them in myself later,
but they are few and far between.
You both need to consider your panel choices more carefully.
We jumped straight into a meeting without officially handing it over...
Oh, I do not mind that at all.
We have not even properly thanked you yet.
Thank you for all you have done.
If we work together in the future, please take care of us!
I am glad I could come here right away.
Thanks to you, my doubts are gone.
I will take what you have done with +NATURAL and use that popularity to my advantage.
I will not lose to you!
Jumping straight into such an advanced meeting... they are amazing.
I will work hard so that I can reach their level soon!
Well then, Miura, you can take it from here.
Well, let us start our meeting.
Even if it is only for work, it is nice to be meeting with such a pretty girl!
The next time you say something like that, I will sue you for sexual harassment!
I have made up my mind.
Takagi and Hattori cast me aside...
I will not lose to anyone anymore.
I will not fall in love anymore!
I will be the best author in the business!
And you h are my editor!
You would better act like it!
Mom, I feel sorry for him.
Drawings that get you inside the characters, huh?
Putting in blank spaces and sound effects, too...
No matter how much we revise, I do not think we can beat Eiji's sense for it.
If I can let my imagination flow like Eiji's...
When do you think you will have the storyboard done by?
Hattori, are not you on vacation?
You are rewriting your storyboard, right?
I cannot afford to take it easy.
I will come see it when you are done.
Well, maybe not on New Year's day.
Sorry about that... it feels like we are making you go along with our schedule.
Hattori is a really nice guy.
Do not you have to redo 52 pages?
Yeah, but we will get it done!
I will contact you after noon on the 2nd.
This is Miura, the editor who will be taking over +NATURAL.
Oh, you were Ashirogi's editor, right?
I am happy to meet you!
You should not have made them write a cliche gag manga!
Ashirogi's all about realistic stories with realistic art!
The next one they are doing is like that.
Good job on getting them there!
This time around, Ashirogi will be a tough opponent.
With a manga that can compete with mine: Perfect Crime Club.
I am sure it has serious humor along with serious art.
And the protagonist must be someone just like Takagi!
And they will do this... and that!
Hattori, did you tell him what it was about?
No, I did not tell him anything.
With them as my partners, I will definitely grow!
Let us work hard so that we do not lose to Ashirogi!
Imagination... blank spaces... and sound effects.
It probably comes to Eiji naturally.
Like how he turns a script into a manga.
Shujin's script should not be any worse than Iwase's!
Um, Mashiro's saying some weird stuff.
Please come over and talk to him, if you can.
All right, I will be over soon.
He is saying he wants the story in script-only format!
Even though I know how to do paneling now...
Is not this a step backwards?
With just a script, I can use my imagination!
I always feel constrained by the storyboard.
I would rather just be given a script so that I can draw freely!
I can put the blank panels where I want!
Only if Takagi's okay with it, of course.
I cannot say for sure if that will make it better.
No, maybe doing it that way will give me more time to write out details on the characters' emotions.
We do work well together, after all.
I can aim for the top with them!
I started drawing a new one-shot.
KIYOSHI h's rating is below Master Niizuma and Hiramaru's, and just about even with Aoki's.
If I let Ashirogi pass me, too, we will not be the Fukuda Team any more!
And if this one-shot affects your serialization...
Of course I will not let KIYOSHI h slip!
I will write this 45 page one shot while continuing with KIYOSHI h as usual.
I will draw straight through the New Year's holiday without a break!
If you are this determined, then I will support you.
We will definitely beat Niizuma Eiji!
An inherited dream can become even bigger!
